name: Stick Journey
description:
Have you ever wanted to go on a real journey?

Hero of this game leaves home to face the dangers and adventures, to see something new and unknown ... but how far will he go? Everything depends on you!



GAME FEATURES:
•Original gameplay with one touch.
•Three colourful worlds
•Game Center support, 64-bit Support, iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+ resolutions!
